title: Sexist Media Attacks on Kamala Harris | Kenya Barris & Isabel Wilkerson
itunes:title: Sexist Media Attacks on Kamala Harris | Kenya Barris & Isabel Wilkerson
description:
Dulce Sloan reacts to sexist attacks on Kamala Harris, Kenya Barris talks about his shows "black-ish" and "#blackAF," and Isabel Wilkerson discusses "Caste."
